trans-unit.source: Contains methods and members that enable communication with Visual Studio, navigation through the control hierarchy in your application, and optimization of the run time layout of controls.
trans-unit.target: 包含一些方法和成员，可实现与 Visual Studio 的通信、通过应用程序中的控件层次结构进行导航，以及优化控件的运行时布局。

trans-unit.source: Some members of this interface can be set only before the Ribbon is loaded into the Office application or before the control is added to a dynamic menu at run time.
trans-unit.target: 只能在功能区加载到 Office 应用程序之前，或者在运行时将控件添加到动态菜单之前，可以设置此接口的某些成员。

trans-unit.source: For information about setting these properties, see [Ribbon Object Model Overview](/visualstudio/vsto/ribbon-object-model-overview.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关设置这些属性的信息，请参阅[功能区对象模型概述](/visualstudio/vsto/ribbon-object-model-overview.md)。

trans-unit.source: Usage
trans-unit.target: 用法

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the name of this <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonComponent" />.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置此 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonComponent" /> 的名称。

trans-unit.source: A string that contains the name of this <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonComponent" />.
trans-unit.target: 一个字符串，包含此 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonComponent" /> 的名称。

trans-unit.source: The name of a control shows up in the **Properties** window.
trans-unit.target: 控件的名称显示在**属性**窗口。

trans-unit.source: It is the ID that Microsoft Office uses to identify this <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonComponent>, and it is the name of the instance of this <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonComponent> in your code.
trans-unit.target: 它是 Microsoft Office 可以使用以确定该 ID <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonComponent>，它是此实例的名称和<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonComponent>在代码中。

trans-unit.source: This property can be set at run time only under certain conditions.
trans-unit.target: 在运行时仅在某些情况下，可以设置此属性。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Ribbon Object Model Overview](/visualstudio/vsto/ribbon-object-model-overview.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[功能区对象模型概述](/visualstudio/vsto/ribbon-object-model-overview.md)。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonComponent" /> that represents the parent of this <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonComponent" />.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonComponent" />，表示此 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonComponent" /> 的父级。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonComponent" /> that represents the parent of this <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonComponent" />.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonComponent" />，表示此 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonComponent" /> 的父级。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonComponent.Parent%2A> property to navigate the control hierarchy to controls a few levels above the current <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonComponent> object.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonComponent.Parent%2A>属性要导航到控件层次结构控制上当前的几个级别<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonComponent>对象。

trans-unit.source: If your control is deeply nested and the control you want to find is closer to the Ribbon, you might want to consider using the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonComponent.Ribbon%2A> property and the collections that belong to the container controls that are derived from <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonComponent> to navigate to the control.
trans-unit.target: 如果你的控件深度嵌套的并且想要查找的控件为更接近于功能区，你可能需要考虑使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonComponent.Ribbon%2A>属性和属于派生自的容器控件的集合<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonComponent>以导航到控件。

trans-unit.source: Calls the <c>Microsoft.Office.Core.IRibbonUI.InvalidateControl</c> method of the parent control if the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonComponent" /> has a dynamic parent, such as a dynamic menu, and layout is not suspended.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonComponent" /> 具有一个动态父级（如动态菜单）且布局未挂起，则调用父控件的 <c>Microsoft.Office.Core.IRibbonUI.InvalidateControl</c> 方法。

trans-unit.source: If the parent is not dynamic, this method calls the `Microsoft.Office.Core.IRibbonUI.InvalidateControl` method of the current control if the layout is not suspended.
trans-unit.target: 如果父不是动态的此方法调用`Microsoft.Office.Core.IRibbonUI.InvalidateControl`如果布局则不会挂起当前控件的方法。

trans-unit.source: Calls <c>Microsoft.Office.Core.IRibbonUI.InvalidateControl</c> if the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonComponent" /> has a parent and layout is not suspended.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonComponent" /> 具有一个父级，且布局未挂起，则调用 <c>Microsoft.Office.Core.IRibbonUI.InvalidateControl</c>。

trans-unit.source: Reverses the effect of the <see cref="M:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonComponent.SuspendLayout" /> method.
trans-unit.target: 取消 <see cref="M:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonComponent.SuspendLayout" /> 方法的效果。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to call the <see cref="M:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonComponent.PerformLayout" /> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要调用 <see cref="M:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonComponent.PerformLayout" /> 方法，请使用 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="false" /> to enable UI refreshes without calling <see cref="M:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonComponent.PerformLayout" />.
trans-unit.target: 若要启用 UI 刷新，而不调用 <see cref="M:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonComponent.PerformLayout" />，请使用 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Reverses the effect of the <see cref="M:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonComponent.SuspendLayout" /> method.
trans-unit.target: 取消 <see cref="M:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonComponent.SuspendLayout" /> 方法的效果。

trans-unit.source: Gets the top-level <see cref="P:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonComponent.Ribbon" /> object that contains the control hierarchy.
trans-unit.target: 获取包含控件层次结构的顶级 <see cref="P:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonComponent.Ribbon" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: A top-level <see cref="P:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonComponent.Ribbon" /> object that contains the rest of the control hierarchy.
trans-unit.target: 包含其余控件层次结构的顶级 <see cref="P:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonComponent.Ribbon" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonComponent.Ribbon%2A> property is best suited for navigating to controls near the top of the control hierarchy.
trans-unit.target: <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonComponent.Ribbon%2A>属性在最适合用于导航到控件层次结构的顶部附近的控件。

trans-unit.source: Gets the <c>IRibbonUI</c> instance that is provided by the Microsoft Office application to the Ribbon extensibility code.
trans-unit.target: 获取 Microsoft Office 应用程序提供给功能区扩展性代码的 <c>IRibbonUI</c> 实例。

trans-unit.source: The <c>IRibbonUI</c> instance that is provided by the Office application to the Ribbon extensibility code.
trans-unit.target: <c>IRibbonUI</c>提供了功能区扩展性代码 Office 应用程序的实例。

trans-unit.source: This property can be used to update Ribbon UI.
trans-unit.target: 此属性可以用于更新功能区 UI。

trans-unit.source: Prevents the Microsoft Office application from refreshing the state of controls on the Ribbon.
trans-unit.target: 阻止 Microsoft Office 应用程序刷新功能区上的控件状态。

trans-unit.source: Calling <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonComponent.SuspendLayout%2A> may result in a slight performance increase if your application has many controls that are frequently updated.
trans-unit.target: 调用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonComponent.SuspendLayout%2A>可能会导致性能稍有增加，如果你的应用程序具有很多会频繁更新的控件。

trans-unit.source: After you change the state of each control, you can call <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonComponent.ResumeLayout%2A> to allow the UI to be refreshed.
trans-unit.target: 更改每个控件的状态后，你可以调用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonComponent.ResumeLayout%2A>以允许 UI 进行刷新。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets application-specific data that is associated with this <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonComponent" />.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置与此 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonComponent" /> 关联的应用程序特定的数据。

trans-unit.source: An <c>System.Object</c> that represents application-specific data that is associated with this <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonComponent" />.
trans-unit.target: <c>System.Object</c>表示与此关联的应用程序特定数据<see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonComponent" />。

trans-unit.source: Any type derived from the `System.Object` class can be assigned to this property.
trans-unit.target: 从派生的任何类型`System.Object`类可以分配给此属性。

trans-unit.source: However, if you set the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonComponent.Tag%2A> property in the Visual Studio **Properties** window, you can only assign text.
trans-unit.target: 但是，如果你设置<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonComponent.Tag%2A>Visual Studio 中的属性**属性**窗口中，你可以仅将文本分配。

trans-unit.source: A common use for the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonComponent.Tag%2A> property is to store data that is closely associated with the control.
trans-unit.target: 一个常见用途<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonComponent.Tag%2A>属性是用于存储与控件密切相关联的数据。

trans-unit.source: For example, if you have a button that displays information about a customer, you might store a `System.Data.DataSet` that contains the customer's order history in the button's <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonComponent.Tag%2A> property so the data can be accessed quickly.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果你有一个按钮，显示有关客户的信息，你可能会存储`System.Data.DataSet`，该字符串包含客户的订单历史记录中按钮的<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonComponent.Tag%2A>属性，以便可以快速访问这些数据。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to set an array of `Employee` objects to the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonComponent.Tag%2A> property of a group and how to retrieve the value of the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonComponent.Tag%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何设置数组的`Employee`对象添加到<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonComponent.Tag%2A>组的属性以及如何检索的值<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonComponent.Tag%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: This example requires that you have defined a class called `Employee` that exposes the <xref:System.String> property `ID` and that you have defined a `GetEmployees` method that returns an array of `Employee` objects.
trans-unit.target: 此示例需要您已经定义了一个名为类`Employee`公开<xref:System.String>属性`ID`和已定义`GetEmployees`返回的数组的方法`Employee`对象。

trans-unit.source: To run this code example, you must first perform the following steps:
trans-unit.target: 若要运行此代码示例，必须首先执行以下步骤：

trans-unit.source: Add a **Ribbon (Visual Designer)** item to a project created by using Office development tools in Visual Studio.
trans-unit.target: 添加**功能区 （可视化设计器）**到通过使用 Visual Studio 中的 Office 开发工具创建的项目的项。

trans-unit.source: Add a button to the default group `Group1`.
trans-unit.target: 将按钮添加到默认组`Group1`。
